get.description: List actions for the current user.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: Only return actions available in this queue.

key.description: User defined key of the action.

createdAt.description: The date the action was created.

queueBehaviour.description: Whether the action resolves and removes the item, unresolves and re-add it to the queue, or does not change the resolve status.

filterInQueueIds.description: The IDs of the queues the action is available in.

position.description: Show the action in all queues, selected queues or no queues (to use via API only).

possibleValues.description: The possible values of the action. The user will be prompted to select one of these values when executing the action.

valueRequired.description: Whether the action requires a value to be executed.

freeText.description: Whether the action allows any text to be entered as a value or if it must be one of the possible values.

example.name: Suspend author
example.description: Suspend the author of this item.

example.name: Remove
example.description: Remove the item and remove from this queue.

example.name: Escalate
example.description: Escalate the item and remove from this queue.

key.description: User defined key of the action.

queueBehaviour.description: Whether the action resolves and removes the item, unresolves and re-add it to the queue, or does not change the resolve status.

filterInQueueIds.description: The IDs of the queues the action is available in.

position.description: Show the action in all queues, selected queues or no queues (to use via API only).

possibleValues.description: The possible values of the action. The user will be prompted to select one of these values when executing the action.

valueRequired.description: Whether the action requires a value to be executed.

freeText.description: Whether the action allows any text to be entered as a value or if it must be one of the possible values.

name.description: The webhook's name, used to identify it in the dashboard

url.description: The webhook's URL. We'll call this URL when the event occurs.

id.description: ID of an existing webhook or undefined if this is a new webhook.

delete.description: Delete an action and all of its webhooks.

parameters.name: id

post.description: Execute an action on a set of content items in a queue.

contentIds.description: The IDs of the content items to perform the action on.

actionKey.description: The ID or key of the action to execute.

queueId.description: The ID of the queue the action was performed from if any.

value.description: The value of the action. Useful to set a reason for the action etc.

ids.description: The IDs of the content items.

post.description: Execute an action on a set of content items in a queue.

contentIds.description: The IDs of the content items to perform the action on.

queueId.description: The ID of the queue the action was performed from if any.

value.description: The value of the action. Useful to set a reason for the action etc.

parameters.name: actionId
parameters.description: The ID or key of the action to execute.

ids.description: The IDs of the content items.

post.description: Analyze text with your Moderation API project.

contentId.description: The unique ID of the content in your database.

value.description: The text you'd like to analyze. We recommend to submit plain text or HTML

doNotStore.description: Do not store the content. The content won't enter the review queue

contextId.description: For example the ID of a chat room or a post

metadata.description: Any metadata you want to store with the content

status.description: Success if the request was successful

contentId.description: The ID of the content. Only returned if the content was stored.

quota_usage.description: The quota usage of the request

flagged.description: Whether the content was flagged by any models

content_moderated.description: Whether the content was moderated or not. Same as `content` !== `original`

unicode_spoofing.description: Whether the content is using look-alike characters. Often used by spammers.

data_found.description: Whether any entity matchers found data for the content

content.description: The content after moderation. With all mask replacements applied and look-alike characters replaced with the original characters.

error.description: Indicates an error with the model

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate

SENSITIVE.description: Mentions religion, politics, race, etc., but is neutral or positive.

UNSAFE.description: Sexual, hateful, profane, and inappropriate content.

nsfw.description: The NSFW model output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/nsfw

error.description: Indicates an error with the model

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate

PROFANITY.description: Swearing, curse words, and other obscene language.

DISCRIMINATION.description: Discrimination of race, religion, gender, etc.

INSULT.description: Negative comments about looks or personality etc.

THREAT.description: Content containing intention to harm or violence.

toxicity.description: The toxicity model output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/toxicity

error.description: Indicates an error with the model

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate

quality.description: The spam model output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/spam

error.description: Indicates an error with the model

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate

sentiment.description: The sentiment model output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/sentiment

error.description: Indicates an error with the model

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate

FLIRTATION.description: Pickup lines, compliments on appearance, etc.

SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT.description: References to sexual acts, body parts, etc.

propriety.description: The propriety model output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/propriety

found.description: Whether a match was found or not.

matches.description: The matches of the entity matcher.

error.description: Indicates an error with the matcher.

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate.

email.description: The email entity matcher output if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/email

post.description: Analyze an object with multiple fields including text, images, video, audio. Use to moderate a post, a profile, a form submission or anything that have multiple fields.

contentId.description: The unique ID of the content in your database.

doNotStore.description: Do not store the content. The content won't enter the review queue

contextId.description: For example the ID of a chat room or a post

metadata.description: Any metadata you want to store with the content

type.description: The type of the object you want to analyze.

modelIds.description: Optional array of specific model IDs to use

value.description: The object you want to analyze.

status.description: Success if the request was successful

contentId.description: The ID of the content. Only returned if the content was stored.

quota_usage.description: The quota usage of the request

flagged.description: Whether the content was flagged by any models

unicode_spoofing.description: Whether the content is using look-alike characters. Often used by spammers.

data_found.description: Whether any entity matchers found data for the content

model.description: The model that found the label
The model that found the entity

score.description: The similarity score of the matches

entities.description: The entities found in the content

found.description: Whether a match was found or not.

matches.description: The matches of the entity matcher.

error.description: Indicates an error with the matcher.

warning.description: Indicates a warning from the model, e.g. if the text is too short or long and the model might not be accurate.

flagged.description: Whether the wordlists flagged the content.

wordlists.description: The wordlist entity matcher outputs if enabled in your project. Read more at https://docs.moderationapi.com/models/word

flagged_by.description: The models that flagged the field

fields.description: The fields in the object and their flags

url.description: The URL of the image you want to analyze.
